Articles.Content: okay, I shot my third rocket and... I think I went too far, ATM my rocket is orbiting around the sun.( and it is out of fuel, so yeah dead crew) The thing I tried to do was get an orbit around kerbin, any hints on that?

Pitch over sooner? You want to start turning towards horizontal ~10-30 km, depending on the rocket. Also, you\'ll want to shut down the engines ~2000-2300 m/s, depending on your altitude. (faster when lower). Check the map (m to toggle) to keep an eye on your projected orbit.
